# https://help.seafile.com/syncing_client/excluding_files/

# OS
.directory
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Python
__pycache__
.venv
*.pyc
.mypy_cache
.pytest_cache
.ruff_cache

# direnv
.direnv

# Ansible
.ansible

# Temporary files generated by editor
*.swp
# tags # git 내부 폴더와 이름이 일치해서, 추가하면 안됨.

# Chromium-based
*.crdownload

# firefox
*.part

# LibreOffice
.~lock.*

# vi:ft=gitignore
